scripts.build-docs: typedoc --name 'streamdata.io SDK' --module umd --target es5 --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --theme build/typedoc-streamdataio-theme --out dist/docs --mode file src
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-node && npm run build-web && npm run build-types && npm run build-docs
